roleset.name: untransformed

example.name: arg1
example.text: I went to see the water and electricity meters -- for water , it was the same as that when I moved in , unchanged ; for electricity , nine kilowatts has been used

example.name: args1, 2
example.text: The July unemployment rate in Ohio was unchanged from 7.2% in the like month last year.
example.arg: The July unemployment rate in Ohio
in the like month last year.
